$SOL‚òï Morning coffee, quiet structure ‚Äî SOL edition
TL;DR:
Structure holds.
Leverage cooled.
Nothing broke ‚Äî despite the candles.
Before the technicals, one honest line:
what‚Äôs moving SOL right now isn‚Äôt ETF headlines, partnerships, influencers, or old retail signals.
It‚Äôs positioning, funding, and liquidation flow. The rest is background noise.
üìä Key numbers (4H):
Price: $125.7 (+1.6% 24h)
Range: $119.1 ‚Üí $130.2
EMA(5/10/30): $125.3 / $124.9 / $124.4 ‚Üí price above short-term structure
RSI(14): ~56 (neutral, controlled)
Funding: ~0.00% ‚Üí slightly positive (no leverage stress)
üìâ Derivatives check:
Long liquidations: ~146K
Short liquidations: ~285K
Long/Short ratio: ~0.99 (balanced, no crowd bias)
Open Interest: ~8.7‚Äì9.0M (stable, not expanding)
‚òëÔ∏è Morning checklist:
‚òëÔ∏è Higher low defended after pullback
‚òëÔ∏è No leverage spike on the downside
‚òëÔ∏è Funding stayed calm
‚òëÔ∏è Order book balanced, no aggressive sweep
‚ö†Ô∏è When risk actually increases:
Risk rises only if funding flips hard + OI expands + downside volume follows.
One red candle inside structure?
That‚Äôs pressure ‚Äî not a breakdown.
‚òï Translation:
The chart didn‚Äôt panic.
It made coffee and waited.
üß† Final note:
Price doesn‚Äôt argue with opinions.
It reacts to positioning.
And this morning, positioning looks‚Ä¶ quiet.

üá∫üá∏ ETF FLOWS (Dec 30, ET): Spot ETFs

For me, this is less about competition and more about finishing the year strong, disciplined, and a little wiser than I started.  If you‚Äôre focused on improving your process and letting results come naturally, this phase is worth paying attention to.

MESSARI‚ÄôS 2026 CRYPTO THESES: POWER STRUGGLES, STABLECOINS, AND SKEPTICISM

Messari‚Äôs 2026 Crypto Theses shift the focus from growth stories to structural stress.

#Ethereum faces a value capture dilemma post-EIP-4844: L2s absorb execution fees, ETH burn slows, and the asset drifts back toward inflation. Without reclaiming execution-layer relevance, ETH risks being squeezed between BTC‚Äôs monetary dominance and L2 application gravity.

At the same time, yield-bearing stablecoins are redefining capital efficiency. In a high-rate world, non-yielding dollars look increasingly obsolete‚Äîbut synthetic models introduce new systemic risks beneath the surface.

#Crypto #ETH #BTC
STABLECOINS, SKEPTICISM, AND WHY RESEARCH IS NOT A TRADE

Messari argues yield-bearing stablecoins may erode USDT‚Äôs dominance by redistributing ‚Äúrisk-free‚Äù yield to holders. Models like USDe benefit in bull markets but carry depeg risk tied to funding rates and leverage demand‚Äîyield is cyclical, not guaranteed.

Historically, Messari‚Äôs calls have been directionally right (SOL, stablecoins, parts of DePIN), but timing and returns vary. Institutional research shapes narratives, not outcomes.

Bottom line: these theses highlight where value leaks and power shifts‚Äînot a playbook, but a warning system.
Read Moreüëâhttps://www.coinrank.io/market/messaris-2026-crypto-theses-power-struggles-stablecoins-and-skepticism-part-2/

$SOL ü§ë Solana bullish below support or additional crash-low?

#Solana #SOL #SOLUSDT

It is red until it is red no more. We are about to see six weeks Solana trading at or below support. Support as is in the 0.786 Fib. retracement level. 

Can Solana be bullish below support? Absolutely...

In March/April 2025 Solana moved below support just to recover, this same level. Here it is marked with a purple dashed line.

Throughout 2024, this same support level was challenged twelve times. What followed was a strong bullish period.

Here we have a mixed signal: Below support SOLUSDT can produce sort of a flush before reversing, just like April. Or it can recover next week right away. It is mixed but both scenarios are possible‚Äîthis chart needs more time.

The buy-zone. Regardless of the short-term Solana is trading within a buy-zone. Regardless what happens in a week or a day the next major move is a bullish wave. The down-wave already ran its course, seems exhausted.

I know it is hard but is wise to buy when prices are low. We are looking at a good entry zone.

$SOL return of the jedi

In 2026. The way Fortune 500 companies apply AI will change.

From "using isolated AI tools" to "deploying Multi-Agent Systems"

Example:
- Not "use ChatGPT to write copy anymore"
- But "an Agent team works for you: Content Agent writes copy, Review Agent checks quality, Publishing Agent uploads to platforms, Analytics Agent tracks performance"

These Agents need to work together like a team.

What does this mean for Solana?

Today's Agents on Solana are all isolated:
- raiku is a Trading Agent
- bulktrade is a Risk Management Agent
- etc.

But in 2026, what we need are Agent organizations:
- Trading Agent + Risk Agent + Settlement Agent collaborating
- Or Liquidity Agent + Market Agent + Arbitrage Agent coordinating

This multi-agent system isn't simple addition, but:
1. High-frequency interaction (requiring ultra-low latency)
2. Real-time information sharing (requiring high bandwidth)
3. Auto-coordination (requiring intelligent scheduling algorithms)

Solana's high speed and low cost characteristics are naturally suited for this.

We're thinking about how to support such multi-agent systems.

ComRODs, we have some closing words for 2025!

2024 was a year of experimentation where we stumbled upon real momentum. Our token ran to an 8M market cap, and we launched one product that truly gained traction: Burn & Claim.

In 2025, we worked really hard on making Burn & Claim the best place to clean up your wallet. We also focused a lot on shaping our brand with the help of @holasoymolly. Along the way, we made a ton of friends at events like Solana Accelerate and mtnDAO, grew our user base to thousands of monthly users, and became profitable. We learned a lot about what it takes to build a product, and we want to expand into other products while applying the same recipe we learned with Burn & Claim.

In 2026, we will continue to work hard on achieving success as a company, and our ultimate goal is to be able to share that success with our holders who have believed in our team and supported us throughout.
